radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild left lower lobe ground-glass opacities; a 2 x 2 cm fluid and air containing structure with surrounding mild haziness/stranding in the right lower quadrant concerning for phlegmon in a periappendiceal region; normal tubular appendix not well delineated; hypodense structures likely representing cysts in the bilateral ovaries (2.4 cm on the right and 2.3 cm on the left); no suspicious lytic or blastic lesions or fractures.
